verses.verse: Moreover <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> a <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

And he <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H4931>charges,<s%> and <S%H2388>encouraged<s%> them to the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H4000>taught<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which were <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5414>Put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H727>ark<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H1129>build;<s%> it shall <S%H369>not<s%> be a <S%H4853>burden<s%> upon your <S%H3802>shoulders:<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

And <S%H3559>prepare<s%> yourselves by the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> after your <S%H4256>courses,<s%> according to the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and according to the <S%H4385>writing<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place according to the <S%H6391>divisions<s%> of the <S%H1004>families<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>people,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> and after the <S%H2515>division<s%> of the <S%H1004>families<s%> <S%H1><s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

So <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> and sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> your <S%H251>brethren,<s%> that they may <S%H6213>do<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H7311>gave<s%> to the <S%H1121>people,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> and <S%H1121>kids,<s%> <S%H5795><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> for the passover <S%H6453>offerings,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H4672>present,<s%> to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>bullocks:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4480>substance.<s%> <S%H7399><s%>

And his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H7311>gave<s%> <S%H5071>willingly<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and to the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> <S%H5057>rulers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%> for the passover <S%H6453>offerings<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> small cattle, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1241>oxen.<s%>

Conaniah <S%H3562><s%> also, and <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> and <S%H5417>Nethaneel,<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H7311>gave<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for passover <S%H6453>offerings<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> small cattle, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1241>oxen.<s%>

So the <S%H5656>service<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H5977>place,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H4256>courses,<s%> according to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4687>commandment.<s%>

And they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the blood from their <S%H4480>hands,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6584>flayed<s%> them.

And they <S%H5493>removed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> that they might <S%H5414>give<s%> according to the <S%H4653>divisions<s%> of the <S%H1004>families<s%> <S%H1><s%> of the <S%H1121>people,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> And <S%H3651>so<s%> did they with the <S%H1241>oxen.<s%>

And they <S%H1310>roasted<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance:<s%> but the other <S%H6944>holy<s%> offerings <S%H1310>sod<s%> they in <S%H5518>pots,<s%> and in <S%H1731>caldrons,<s%> and in <S%H6745>pans,<s%> and divided them <S%H7323>speedily<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> they made <S%H3559>ready<s%> for themselves, and for the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were busied in <S%H5927>offering<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3915>night;<s%> therefore the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for themselves, and for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

And the <S%H7891>singers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> were <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H4612>place,<s%> according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> and <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H2374>seer;<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters<s%> waited at every <S%H8179>gate;<s%> <S%H8179><s%> they might <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> their <S%H5656>service;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for them.

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> and to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6453>passover<s%> like <S%H3644>to<s%> that <S%H6213>kept<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>keep<s%> such a <S%H6453>passover<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6213>kept,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H4672>present,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
In the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> was <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6453>passover<s%> <S%H6213>kept.<s%>

After <S%H310><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>temple,<s%> <S%H5224>Necho<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3751>Carchemish<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates:<s%> and <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him.

But he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I to do with thee, thou <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%> I come <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H859>thee<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> wherewith I have <S%H4421>war:<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> me to make <S%H926>haste:<s%> <S%H2308>forbear<s%> thee from meddling with <S%H4480>God,<s%> <S%H430><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> me, that he <S%H7843>destroy<s%> thee <S%H408>not.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5437>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him, <S%H3588>but<s%> disguised <S%H2664>himself,<s%> that he might <S%H3898>fight<s%> with him, and <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5224>Necho<s%> from the <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo.<s%>

And the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> at <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> Have me <S%H5674>away;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am sore <S%H2470>wounded.<s%> <S%H3966><s%>

His <S%H5650>servants<s%> therefore <S%H5674>took<s%> him out <S%H4480>of<s%> that <S%H4818>chariot,<s%> and <S%H7392>put<s%> him <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had; and they <S%H1980>brought<s%> him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in one of the <S%H6913>sepulchers<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah.<s%>

And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H6969>lamented<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the singing <S%H7891>men<s%> and the singing <S%H7891>women<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> in their <S%H7015>lamentations<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> them an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H7015>lamentations.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> and his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> according to that which was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

And his <S%H1697>deeds,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
